root: ^NOLWAZI: I'm not here to cause trouble.
^CHILD 1: We know who you are don’t take our family away, we have done nothing wrong!
^NOLWAZI: I’m not here to take your family away, I just need help finding some information. I promise I mean no harm.
^Out of fear the children scatter, running towards the village square. Safiya, the current chief, sees the commotion and approaches Nolwazi with caution.
